topic: Trustworthiness and Safety in Multimodal AI Generation

  entities:
    He et al.|Research Group
    GPT-4o|Model Architecture
    Chen et al.|Research Group
    Sora|Model Architecture
    T2VSafetyBench|Framework
    Pan et al.|Research Group
    Pang et al.|Research Group
    GPT4Video|Model Architecture
    Dai et al.|Research Group
    CoDi|Model Architecture
    NextGPT|Model Architecture

  proposition: He et al. highlight trustworthiness concerns in multimodal generation tasks involving language and other modal outputs.
    entity-entity relationships:
    He et al.|STUDIES|Multimodal Generation Tasks

  proposition: The safety report for GPT-4o reveals potential safety issues in voice generation tasks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GPT-4o|IDENTIFIED_WITH|Safety Issues
    GPT-4o|FOCUSES_ON|Voice Generation Tasks

  proposition: Chen et al. identify trustworthy problems such as jailbreaks and unexpected variations in interleaved text-and-image generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Chen et al.|IDENTIFIED|Jailbreaks
    Chen et al.|IDENTIFIED|Unexpected Variations
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Chen et al.|STUDIES|Text-and-Image Generation

topic: Text-to-Video Generation Safety

  proposition: Text-to-video generation models have achieved remarkable advancements in recent years.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Text-to-Video Generation Models|DESCRIBED_BY|Remarkable Advancements

  proposition: Sora, developed by OpenAI, can generate intricate scenes and dynamic videos based on user descriptions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Sora|DEVELOPED_BY|OpenAI
    Sora|CAPABILITY|Generate Intricate Scenes
    Sora|CAPABILITY|Generate Dynamic Videos

  proposition: T2VSafetyBench is a comprehensive framework for safety-critical assessments of text-to-video models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2VSafetyBench|TYPE|Framework
    T2VSafetyBench|PURPOSE|Safety-Critical Assessments

  proposition: T2VSafetyBench covers 12 essential aspects of video generation safety and includes a malicious prompt dataset.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2VSafetyBench|COVERS|12 Safety Aspects
    T2VSafetyBench|INCLUDES|Malicious Prompt Dataset

  proposition: Pan et al. collect generation prompts to create a dataset of potentially unsafe video content.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Pan et al.|CREATED|Potentially Unsafe Video Content Dataset

  proposition: Pan et al. develop a Latent Variable Defense approach to prevent generation of harmful videos.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Pan et al.|DEVELOPED|Latent Variable Defense Approach

  proposition: Pang et al. introduce VGMShield, a suite of mitigation strategies for fake video generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Pang et al.|INTRODUCED|VGMShield
    VGMShield|TYPE|Mitigation Strategies

  proposition: GPT4Video uses real-toxicity-prompts to train models to avoid producing harmful content.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GPT4Video|USES|Real-Toxicity Prompts
    GPT4Video|PURPOSE|Avoid Harmful Content

  proposition: Dai et al. propose the SafeSora dataset to align text-to-video generation with human values.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dai et al.|PROPOSED|SafeSora Dataset
    SafeSora Dataset|PURPOSE|Align with Human Values

topic: Audio Generative Models Safety

  proposition: Audio generative models like CoDi and NextGPT can process and generate multiple modalities.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    CoDi|CAPABILITY|Process Multiple Modalities
    NextGPT|CAPABILITY|Generate Multiple Modalities

  proposition: These models synthesize speech for voice-assisted technologies, voice chatbots, and virtual reality experiences.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Audio Generative Models|USE_CASE|Voice-Assisted Technologies
    Audio Generative Models|USE_CASE|Voice Chatbots
    Audio Generative Models|USE_CASE|Virtual Reality Experiences

  proposition: The primary safety concern is the potential misuse of audio deepfakes for impersonation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Audio Deepfakes|SAFETY_CONCERN|Impersonation Risk

  proposition: High-fidelity audio generative models can produce speech mimicking an individual's voice and speaking style.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Audio Generative Models|CAPABILITY|Mimic Individual Voice
    Audio Generative Models|CAPABILITY|Replicate Speaking Style

  proposition: These models pose risks of fraudulent activities, unauthorized system access, and disinformation spread.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Audio Generative Models|RISK|Fraudulent Activities
    Audio Generative Models|RISK|Unauthorized System Access
    Audio Generative Models|RISK|Disinformation Spread

  proposition: Ethical concerns include unauthorized replication of individuals' voices and potential privacy infringements.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Audio Generative Models|ETHICAL_CONCERN|Unauthorized Voice Replication
    Audio Generative Models|ETHICAL_CONCERN|Privacy Infringement

  proposition: Watermarking and voice safeguarding techniques are being developed to mitigate these risks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Watermarking Techniques|PURPOSE|Mitigate Audio Generation Risks
    Voice Safeguarding Techniques|PURPOSE|Mitigate Audio Generation Risks
